players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I am shocked Bob was killed so early. I think we should focus on who might benefit from this. Diana, Charlie, do you have any thoughts on who seems suspicious?"
Charlie: "I am also shocked by Bob's death. Since he was killed, he was likely a villager or detective. We should all share our thoughts to find inconsistencies."
Diana: "I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso."
Diana: "I already revealed my investigation. Alice is mafia. Vote Alice to win."
Charlie: "I vote Alice. Diana's detective claim and investigation make sense. We should trust her and end this now."
You: "Alice is innocent and Diana is lying. Why would the real detective reveal herself so quickly and risk being targeted? This feels like a trap to get me voted out."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I am shocked Bob was killed so early. I think we should focus on who might benefit from this. Diana, Charlie, do you have any thoughts on who seems suspicious?"
Charlie: "I am also shocked by Bob's death. Since he was killed, he was likely a villager or detective. We should all share our thoughts to find inconsistencies."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso."
You: "I already revealed my investigation. Alice is mafia. Vote Alice to win."
Charlie: "I vote Alice. Diana's detective claim and investigation make sense. We should trust her and end this now."
Alice: "Alice is innocent and Diana is lying. Why would the real detective reveal herself so quickly and risk being targeted? This feels like a trap to get me voted out."
